00115 /* Preprocessor directive that conditionally compiles the code that uses the weakly-linked MessageUI.Framework.
00116  This framework is required if you want to include the ability to share activities with email or sms.  By default
00117  the JRENGAGE_INCLUDE_EMAIL_SMS flag should always be set to "1", which can cause errors with the linker if the 
00118  framework isn't included, but I figured most apps would want the email and sms sharing ability.  If you don't want
00119  to add the MessageUI.Framework to one or more of your apps that use the JREngage library, you don't have to change
00120  this value to "0" (which could cause merging issues if I make changes later).
00121  
00122  Instead, if you want to override this setting, you need to add the preprocessor flag "OVERRIDE_INCLUDE_EMAIL_SMS"
00123  to your target's GCC_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS build setting (also listed as "Preprocessor Macros" under the
00124  "GCC 4.2 - Preprocessing" heading). */
00125 #ifndef OVERRIDE_INCLUDE_EMAIL_SMS
00126 #define JRENGAGE_INCLUDE_EMAIL_SMS 1
00127 #endif
00128
